member.name: T:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataReference
member.summary: A data reference is is a pointer to a record in DataStore. Class methods to read and write from/to DataStore, to delete a data reference, and to get meta data about the reference.

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataReference.dataType
member.summary: DataType of reference

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataReference.#ctor(Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore,System.Int32,Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.ReferenceDataType)
member.summary: Default data class constructor. Possible to create max of 256 active data objects.
member.param: DataStore object
Size of the data object to be stored in DataStore. Max size is (2^32 - 1) if type is bytes; (2^31 - 1) if type is uint16; (2^30 - 1) if type is uint32
Type of data to be stored in DataStore
member.exception: Method invocation has an invalid argument
Method invocation has an invalid argument

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataReference.#ctor(Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a data object corresponding to the input parameter data ID. Possible to create max of 256 active data objects.
member.param: DataStore object
ID of data for which user wants a reference/handle
member.exception: Method invocation has an invalid argument
Method invocation has an invalid argument

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataReference.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Write a byte array into DataStore, specifying the amount to write and the offset from the start of the record.
member.param: Array to write
Offset from start of DataStore allocation to write to, and not an offset from start of data array. Even value recommended for byte data type.
Count of data to be written to DataStore

member.name: T:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore
member.summary: DataStore class to store data. Can be any implemented block storage device.

member.summary: The block storage device type

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.DSInstance
member.summary: The only instance of DataStore.

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.syncObject
member.summary: For synchronization between multiple threads

member.name: F:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.dataStoreInstances
member.summary: HashTable for storing multiple instances of DataStore initialized to different block storage devices

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.#ctor
member.summary: Private constructor so that only one instance of DataStore exists.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.Instance(Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.StorageType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Multiton pattern. This allows DataStore to be initialized with different block storage devices such as NOR, NAND etc. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Multiton_pattern

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.InitDataStore(Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.StorageType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes DataStore with specified storage type.
member.param: Storage type
Should datastore be erased?

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.ReadAllDataReferences(Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataReference[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Fills an array with data references from specified offset.
member.param: Data reference array
Offset from first data reference in DataStore
member.remarks: Typically an offset variable. passed as the second argument, is initialized to zero and incremented by the size of the data reference array after each invocation of the method. This will iteratively return all data references. If, after invocation, the array is null then no more data references.
member.exception: Method invocation has an invalid argument

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.DeleteAllData
member.summary: Deletes all data references from DataStore. Does not actually erase the data, but marks them as inactive.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.GC
member.summary: Performs garbage collection on DataStore. This is done internally by DataStore when there is not enough space to add new data. GC rearranges data internally so that all active data are grouped together. Then the inactive data are erased one block at a time.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.NonVolatileMemory.DataStore.EraseAllData
member.summary: Deletes all data references from DataStore and erases them.

member.summary: Write data array to DataStore starting from specified address
member.param: Address to write to
Data to be written to DataStore
Offset from start of DataStore allocationto write.
Count of bytes to be written
Data type to be written

member.summary: Garbage Collector class.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.GC.GetUsedKBytes
member.summary: Get amount of used heap space in kilo bytes.
member.returns: Amount of used heap in kilo bytes.

member.summary: Get amount of free heap space in kilo bytes.
member.returns: Amount of free heap space in kilo bytes.

member.summary: Check if Samraksh's Garbage Collection extensions are enabled or not.
member.returns: True iff Samraksh GC extensions enabled.

member.summary: Enable incremental compaction of heap in GC.

member.summary: Disable incremental compaction of heap in GC.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.GC.CleanBeforeSleep(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Instruct GC to clean the heap and create the amount of space specified, then puts CPU to sleep.
member.param: Amount of free space to be created.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.GC.CleanNow(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Instruct GC to clean the heap now (suspending managed code execution) and create the amount of space specified.
member.param: Amount of free space to be created.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.GC.CleanNow
member.summary: Instruct GC to clean the heap now and create as much space as possible, without compaction.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.GC.AvgTimeForCleaning
member.summary: Average time for the Mark and Sweep operation. Implements weighted (0.5 weight) moving average.
member.returns: Average Mark and Sweep time in microseconds.

member.name: M:Samraksh.eMote.GC.AvgTimeForCompaction
member.summary: Average time for the compaction operation. Implements weighted (0.5 weight) moving average.
member.returns: Average Mark and Sweep time as microseconds.
